desc: It is implied by the phenomenon of conversion that some words hold multiple parts of speech. That is to say, these multi-part-of-speech words might confuse the language models in terms of POS tagging. Accordingly, we replace adverbs with words holding multiple parts of speech.

examples.ori: `` Such agency ` self-help ' borrowing is unauthorized and expensive , far more expensive than direct Treasury borrowing
examples.trans: `` Such agency ` self-help ' borrowing is unauthorized and expensive , haphazard more expensive than direct Treasury borrowing

examples.ori: PaineWebber also was able to gear up on thanks to the 1987 crash
examples.trans: PaineWebber half-and-half was able to gear up on thanks to the 1987 crash
